Package com.company.world

Class Tracker

java.lang.Object
com.company.world.Tracker
All Implemented Interfaces:
city.cs.engine.StepListener, java.util.EventListener
public class Tracker
extends java.lang.Object
implements city.cs.engine.StepListener
Tracker mainly used in level 3 to spawn balls randomly until the Spartan has a score of >25. A Randomly generated value is used here which is either 0,1,2,3, or 4. Accordingly, a ball will spawn in one of those five positions, as specified in the Spikeball class.

  • Method Details

    • preStep

      public void preStep​(city.cs.engine.StepEvent stepEvent)
      Used to randomly spawn Spikeballs in one of five locations. Creates a random value between 0 and 5, then, using the constructor of the Spikeball class, spawns the balls in one of those locations. When the Hero destroys 15 or more balls, the level is considered beaten and he moves on.
      Specified by:
      preStep in interface city.cs.engine.StepListener
      Parameters:
      stepEvent -
